Title: How to Confront Business Nightmares
Description:
Today, we hear from:

  • A business leader who is in the middle of a family business nightmare from inheritance
  • A business owner who wants Dave to talk him out of financing a vehicle for the tax break
  • An inventor who is wondering if he should work with a venture capitalist
  • A journeyman carpenter who wants to know the difference between greed and profit
